text: Sponsor or sponsorship may refer to a person or organization with some role (especially one of responsibility) regarding another person or organisation: *Sponsor (commercial), supporter of an event, activity, or person *Sponsor (legislative), a person who introduces a bill *Sponsor (genus), a genus of beetles *Child sponsorship, form of charitable giving *Ship sponsor *Sponsor of baptism, see godparent *Sponsorship in a twelve-step program *"Sponsor" (song), a song by Teairra Marí ==See also== * Sponsored walks / walkathons, class of charitable fundraising/publicity activities
title: Sponsor
